title: How to improve my character instead of my personality - Quora
tags: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People

response.answer_text: You will have to find out your real character first . Opinions of others are never true indications of your character . Only you know your real character , provided you search for it and acknowledge ,accept and try to change it for better . There is a definite method to find out your own character . Sit quietly away from outside interruptions and look at your life as you remember it . Think of each and every incident in your life and analyze it ruthelessly , especially your own behaviour . If you do this consistently and honestly you will find a pattern or patterns and discover your true character . You can also look at the unceasing mental dialogue going on in your mind . If you feel that you need to dismantle certain character faults and develope new quqalities , create an action plan and implement it . If you improve your character , it will reflect in your personality . Thanks for asking a good question .

Assess yourself and evaluate your key decisions and actions on three parameters: Congruence (between thoughts, words and actions)Respect (unconditional regard for oneself and others); andEmpathy (ability to sense what others feel and why)
